(empty = keep old)","oldLotId":"The lot ID to adjust","reason":"Reason for adjustment"},"returns":{"newLotId":"The new lot ID"}},"consolidateLots(bytes32[])":{"details":"Combines lots using weighted average cost basis and earliest acquisition date.      Original lot data remains in storage for audit trail (marked invalid).      Tax implications:      - Uses weighted average cost basis (IRS-approved for mutual funds/securities)      - Preserves earliest acquisition date for long-term capital gains eligibility      - Irreversible - consider carefully before consolidating","params":{"lotIds":"Array of lot IDs to consolidate (must all belong to same owner)"},"returns":{"newLotId":"The new consolidated lot ID"}},"createLot(address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,string,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"The `data` parameter should be ABI-encoded IToken.LotCreationData struct:      - termsData: Token-specific terms (e.g., SAFETerms for SAFE tokens)      - complianceData: Compliance config (e.g., abi.encode(bool isAffiliate))      Both fields are optional. For backwards compatibility, if data doesn't      decode as LotCreationData, it's treated as termsData only.","params":{"acquisitionDate":"Acquisition timestamp","costBasis":"Total cost basis for this lot (total investment amount, not per-token)","customId":"Custom ID (0 for auto-assign)","data":"Structured lot creation data (see IToken.LotCreationData)","owner":"Lot owner","paymentCurrency":"Payment currency","quantity":"Quantity of tokens","uri":"Metadata URI"},"returns":{"assignedCustomId":"Assigned custom ID","lotId":"Generated lot ID"}},"customIdToLotId(uint256)":{"params":{"customId":"Custom identifier"},"returns":{"_0":"Lot identifier"}},"getLot(bytes32)":{"params":{"lotId":"Lot identifier"},"returns":{"_0":"Lot information"}},"getLotsOf(address)":{"params":{"account":"Account to query"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of lot identifiers"}},"getTaxStrategy(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"Tax strategy (0=FIFO, 1=LIFO, 2=HIFO, 3=LOFO)"}},"invalidateLot(bytes32)":{"details":"Only authorized admins can cancel lots for administrative corrections","params":{"lotId":"Lot ID to invalidate"}},"lotExists(bytes32)":{"params":{"lotId":"Lot identifier"},"returns":{"_0":"True if lot exists"}},"lotIdToCustomId(bytes32)":{"params":{"lotId":"Lot identifier"},"returns":{"_0":"Custom identifier"}},"nextCustomId()":{"returns":{"_0":"Next custom ID"}},"packedSelectors()":{"details":"Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)","returns":{"_0":"Tightly packed bytes4 selectors"}},"selectLotsForAmount(address,uint256)":{"details":"Public function for use by ERC-20 transfer logic.      Optimized: ownerLots[] now only contains valid lots (O(1) removal on invalidation)","params":{"amount":"Amount needed","user":"User address"},"returns":{"quantities":"Array of quantities from each lot","selectedLots":"Array of lot IDs"}},"setTaxStrategy(uint8)":{"params":{"strategy":"Tax strategy (0=FIFO, 1=LIFO, 2=HIFO, consolidateLots(bytes32[]).details: Combines lots using weighted average cost basis and earliest acquisition date.      Original lot data remains in storage for audit trail (marked invalid).      Tax implications:      - Uses weighted average cost basis (IRS-approved for mutual funds/securities)      - Preserves earliest acquisition date for long-term capital gains eligibility      - Irreversible - consider carefully before consolidating

params.lotIds: Array of lot IDs to consolidate (must all belong to same owner)

createLot(address,uint256,address,uint25.details: The `data` parameter should be ABI-encoded IToken.LotCreationData struct:      - termsData: Token-specific terms (e.g., SAFETerms for SAFE tokens)      - complianceData: Compliance config (e.g., abi.encode(bool isAffiliate))      Both fields are optional. For backwards compatibility, if data doesn't      decode as LotCreationData, it's treated as termsData only.

params.costBasis: Total cost basis for this lot (total investment amount, not per-token)

invalidateLot(bytes32).details: Only authorized admins can cancel lots for administrative corrections

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

selectLotsForAmount(address,uint256).details: Public function for use by ERC-20 transfer logic.      Optimized: ownerLots[] now only contains valid lots (O(1) removal on invalidation)

returns.quantities: Array of quantities from each lot

transferLotAs(address,bytes32,address,ui.details: Called by TokenERC7752Facet after approval checks

updateLotURI(bytes32,string).details: Only lot owner or admin can update the URI

consolidateLots(bytes32[]).notice: Consolidate multiple lots into a single lot (admin only)

customIdToLotId(uint256).notice: Get lot ID from custom ID

getLotsOf(address).notice: Get all lots owned by account

lotIdToCustomId(bytes32).notice: Get custom ID from lot ID

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

selectLotsForAmount(address,uint256).notice: Select lots for a given amount based on user's tax strategy

setTaxStrategy(uint8).notice: Set user's tax strategy for lot selection during ERC-20 transfers

transferLotAs(address,bytes32,address,ui.notice: Transfer lot on behalf of owner (for ERC-7752 approved transfers)

updateLotURI(bytes32,string).notice: Update the URI for a specific lot
